CPU: Intel Core i5-12600K: A powerful 10-core processor suitable for gaming and multitasking, featuring a base clock speed of 3.7 GHz and a turbo boost up to 4.9 GHz.
RAM: Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR4-3200: Ideal for gaming and multitasking, this RAM kit has a speed of 3200 MHz and low-profile heat spreaders for better cooling.
Storage: Seagate Barracuda 2TB HDD: A reliable hard disk drive with ample storage capacity suited for bulk data storage such as games, videos, and files, with a rotational speed of 7200 RPM.
GPU: AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT: A strong competitor in the mid-range graphics market, provides great performance for 1440p gaming and supports AMD's Smart Access Memory technology.
